password: Password must be longer than 8 characters and include at least one number
phoneNumber: Phone number must be a valid format
email: Email must be a valid format
userNotFound: User with this email not found
date: Date must be a valid format
link: Link must be a valid format. Example: https://www.google.com
hotelPrices: Hotel prices must be a valid format
checkoutDateIsBeforeCheckinDate: Checkout date is before checkin date
checkoutDateMustBeDifferent: Checkout date must be different than checkin date
seasonDatesAreNotAvailable: Dates for season are not available
